short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Better Way to filter Upwork.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Customized Search Like Never Before

Our extension introduces an unparalleled level of customization and filtering options that go beyond the basic features offered by Upwork. From specific project requirements to preferred client histories, "Better Upwork Search / Filter" equips you with the means to sift through the noise and pinpoint the jobs that best match your skills and preferences.

Key Features

Connects to Apply Filter: Choose opportunities based on the number of connects required, enabling you to conserve valuable connects for the jobs best suited to your profile.
Fixed Price or Hourly: Tailor your search to the type of payment structure you prefer, whether it's the stability of fixed-price contracts or the flexibility of hourly engagements.
Client Payment Verification: Filter searches based on client payment verification status, helping you to focus on jobs from verified clients, thus reducing the risk of unpaid work.
Geographical Filtering: The innovative "Remove Countries" feature allows you to exclude job listings from specific countries, making it easier to find opportunities best suited to your time zone or client location preference.
